briefdescription.para: Constructs upper triangular part of KKT matrix with -I for Nestrov-Todd scaling matrix (the (3,3) block)

detaileddescription.para: clang-format off [ P A^T G^T ] K = | A 0 0 | [ G 0 -I ]

briefdescription.para: Gets initial values for primal and dual variables such that (s,z) \in C.
Set the Nesterov-Todd block to be zeros. Used prior to compute_kkt_residual().
Updates and regularizes Nesterov-Todd scaling block of KKT matrix.

detaileddescription.para: [ P A^T G^T ] K = | A 0 0 | [ G 0 -W'W - e * I ]

briefdescription.para: Computes residual of KKT conditions and stores in work->kkt->rhs.

detaileddescription.para: clang-format off [ P A^T G^T ] [ x ] [ c ] res = | A 0 0 | | y ] + | -b | [ G 0 0 ] [ z ] [ -h + s ]

briefdescription.para: Constructs rhs for the affine scaling KKT system. Before calling this function, work->kkt->kktres must contain the residual of the KKT conditions as computed by compute_kkt_residual().
Constructs rhs for the combined direction KKT system. Before calling this function, work->kkt->kktres must contain the negative residual of the KKT conditions as computed by compute_kkt_residual().

inbodydescription.para: ds = -cone_product(lambda, lambda) - settings.mehrotra * cone_product((W' \ Dsaff), (W * Dzaff), pdata) + sigma * mu * e.

briefdescription.para: Solves Kx = b once K has been factored. Solves via triangular solves and applies iterative refinement afterwards.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to rhs of kkt system.
Number of iterations of iterative refinement performed.

briefdescription.para: Computes y = Kx where [ P A^T G^T ] K = | A 0 0 | [ G 0 -W'W - e * I ].
